```{r}
library(fields)

load("data/dennys.Rdata")
load("data/lq.Rdata")

count = 0
for(i in seq_along(hotels[[1]])){
  dist = rdist.earth.vec(matrix(c(as.numeric(hotels$long)[i],
                                  as.numeric(hotels$lat)[i]),ncol=2),
                         matrix(c(as.numeric(dennys.US$long),
                                  as.numeric(dennys.US$lat)),ncol=2),
                         miles=TRUE, 
                         R = 6371)
  if(min(dist) < 1){
    count = count +1
  }
}
count
rate = count/length(hotels[[1]])
rate
```
